WRITING.TEXT: Can I ask why you're so against NA? No judgement, just curious.

I need to get back into the gym. But I'm also currently working on recovering from an eating disorder. I really, really miss not being able to work out. It has such healing power. I jut know right now I'm not in a head space where I could get into too heavy of an exercise routine without risking my eating disorder flaring up again. :/ Sucks but right now, healing and recovery in all aspects are number one priority. Hoping to get back into snowboarding this season though. Looking forward to that. :)

WRITING.TITLE: Wanted to share this with you guys
WRITING.TEXT:
It's been a rough week. Life kind of took a shit on me. BUT. This has helped. Keep your heads up. Much love.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rpOOfCO0ZqU
Not a problem :) I sincerely hope things work out for the best. You've got this. Just don't give up. This subreddit is also a great great place for support. Sooo many good people here.

I know in my area a lot of the time meetings have kids rooms for people in that exact position. Or there are people with toddlers who will just bring them into the meeting with them. They also sometimes have morning meetings. I would say it's definitely worth at least looking into. Even if you can only go once, if you go to that one meeting and introduce yourself as a newcomer they'll typically give you a phone number list of people there who are willing to support anyone in recovery. So even if you can't necessarily make it to a lot of meetings consistently, you could get to know some people living the clean life and get some numbers you can call when you're struggling. I can't recommend doing everything you can to get there at least once enough.
And you definitely can do this. Stay strong. :)

From my experience, the physical wds will drop off significantly after day 5 or 6. Not going to lie, the mental/emotional part is there a while longer. But after about 2 weeks things get soooo much easier. Have you thought of going to an NA meeting?

I'm only on day 13. I've been going cold turkey, no subs or anything. I don't know if I have any amazing advice. But if you need anyone to talk to or rant to or whatever, feel free to message me. Best of luck hun.
EDIT: You can do it. Promise promise :)

Really struggling. I don't know why. Waking up with crazy anxiety the past few days. It's day 13 for me. I don't know why but things are getting harder. It's becoming more and more of a fight to make it through the day (not to mention the nights) without picking up. But. At the same time, I'm still here and I'm still alive to fight another day. Peace and love to everyone out there struggling right along with me.

I know I'm late for this, but I need to check in. I'm struggling tonight. I don't even have a legitimate reason for it which just makes me angry at myself. Woke up with anxiety, getting worse and worse as the night goes on. I don't know why my head is in such a rough place right now. But I'm having a harder time not picking up right now than I can remember having before. I'm really, really struggling.
Hey. Just wanted to say I hope your exams went well. :)
You're doing awesome!!! This is the beginning of my day 10. Keep it up man :) Much love
You too!! You've got it. Much love.
Thanks!! Best of luck to ya! You'll do awesome. :)
Hopefully! I'm almost a little surprised I made it out. haha. I didn't know if I'd be able to. Thank god for the support here!
Haha I'm actually taking a semester off (THANK GOD) to work. But I'm doing a double major international studies and constitutional law.

WRITING.TITLE: Just wanted to let you know....
WRITING.TEXT: I am OFFICIALLY done with finals!!! WOO!!! I made it!! I maybe didn't do as awesome as I would have liked. But I made it through all of them and made it to day 9. Thanks everyone for your support. Hope you have a fantastic day. :)
